price: Чынында, Биз силерге Акыйкатты алып келдик, бирок, көпчүлүгүңөр аны жаман көрүп жатасыңар».
arabic: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
